summary: Adds armored circlets for all the helmets added in the Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLC.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds craftable circlet versions of all the helmets that are in the Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLC. This includes craftable helmets like Nordic Carved and Stalhrim as well as all the unique helmets like the Deathbrand Helmet and Miraak. Dawnguard and unique circlets require the original helmet in order to make the circlet version.

For vanilla helmets I recommend Armored Circlets by Quickfox http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7696
author: Banit0

files.name: DLC Circlets
files.changelogHtml:
Removed perk requirement from crafting all unique circlets
Added recipes to convert helmets directly into its circlet version

files.name: Dawnguard Circlets
